title: Do not mix ratings from Windows Phone 8.1 and Windows 10 Mobile users
body: I have two versions of my app: one for Windows Phone 8.1 (v1.x.x.x) and another one for Windows 10 Mobile (v2.x.x.x). Latter uses new features of Windows 10 and receives excellent reviews, but store mixes them with worse ratings from Windows Phone 8.1 users.
